column18: 01/29/2006: Unidentified gunmen attacked Lesotho�s foreign minister, Monyane Moleleki, in Maseru, Lesotho, as he arrived home from a government meeting. The gunmen shot the minister in the arm. There were no claims of responsibility for the attack.
